name: Bulk User Delete Plugin
description: This plugin can be used to completely purge groups of users from a Mattermost system.

settings.help_text: Users with email addresses that contain a suffix from this list will be purged from the system.

settings.display_name: Exact email addresses to match (comma-separated list):
settings.help_text: Users with email addresses that match from this list exactly will be purged from the system.
